name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Roy Tang  That's fair. Though you'd be surprised how many people think they're on the side of good despite bad methods (eg. Bribery as a means to get things done in a system that cannot get things done on its own is a slippery slope of morality)    Thanks for the clarif.
